intro: Metopium gentlei, commonly known as the slender metopium, is a flowering plant native to parts of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its delicate, fragrant flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are opposite, simple, and often have a velvety texture. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, preferring partial shade and well-drained soil.
